posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked:
Hi everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.34.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here .

Release notes:

  • The new filter icon next to the search box makes it easy to quickly find unread chats, but feel free to take your time deciding whether or not to leave them on read after seeing what they had to say.
  • This update introduces support for new processors on Windows like the Snapdragon X Elite, so you don’t need to twist your ARM into emulating x86 anymore.
  • We also fixed a bug that broke the dark theme in Signal when your operating system settings were configured to use a light theme. Signal Desktop can now properly handle your thematically split personality.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.33.0-beta.1…v7.34.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

Thanks for being a beta tester!

New Version: 7.34.0-beta.1

48 new commits since 7.33.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.34.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Fix win32 arm translation check [2]

  • Update HKDF constants for backups [3]

  • Fix binary name in CI [4]

  • Consider own join time for group call missing media key check [5]

  • Ensure that calls ring at more appropriate times [6]

  • Improve message migration error handling [7]

  • Fix ringing direct calls to wait for after prering state [8]

  • Update to libsignal 0.60.2 [9]

  • Don't run storage service concurrently with backup [10]

  • Show backup import UI on Link-and-Sync [11]

  • Fix adding large stickers in media editor [12]

  • Add recordIkm to generated ManifestRecord [13]

  • Update to ringrtc v2.48.6 [14]

  • Add experimental Linux support for ringrtc ADM. [15]

  • Timeout provisioning socket when visibility=false [16]

  • Brand Refresh [17]

  • Change attributes before queuing job [18]

  • Fix dark mode when in light mode os theme [19]

  • Retain strikethrough formatting in message bubble mentions [20]

  • Improve scroll behavior of left pane [21]

  • Use classes for QueryFragment in sql [22]

  • Update device naming flow during link and sync [23]

  • Bump electron from 33.0.1 to 33.1.0 [24]

  • Fix context menu text being different based on where right click occurred for emojis (#9215) [25]

  • Add release notes for 7.33 [26]

  • Update strings [27]

  • Update DNS fallback [28]

  • Request contact sync before importing backup [29]

  • Fix pixelated windows app icon [30]

  • Export/import verified state [31]

  • Deprecate Keys.storageService sync field [32]

  • Fully sync before exporting a backup [33]

  • Batch redux conversation changed / added actions [34]

  • Reorder checks in initialization sequence [35]

  • Refactor force-update updater mode [36]

  • Fix useHasWrapped hook [37]

  • Fix download progress reporting for force update [38]

  • Show update UI on backup version mismatch [39]

  • Improve windows icon at smaller sizes [40]

  • Update backup media idle state after resuming download [41]

  • Update backup benchmark timing [42]

  • Update call view icons [43]

  • Improve backup export benchmark measurement [44]

  • Filter by Unread [45]

  • Release notes for 7.34 [46]

  • Update strings [47]

  • 7.34.0-beta.1 [48]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.33.0-beta.1…v7.34.0-beta.1

posts.name: Talya (she/her)
posts.cooked:
uhhh… what?
is this version just a number change and that’s it?

posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked: The Windows ARM binary didn’t get built on v7.34.0-beta.1, so we had to update the build script and bump the version number :)

posts.name: skmedix
posts.cooked: I like that the icon is now white, but it scales badly on Windows 11 in the tray. I hope this can be fixed

Signal gave me some errors and this log:
DebugLog

New Version: 7.34.0-beta.3

7 new commits since 7.34.0-beta.2:

  • Fix pre call info for call links with admin approval [1]

  • For outgoing 1:1 calls, start ringing on prering status [2]

  • Update to ringrtc 2.48.7 [3]

  • Better handling of failed message migration attempts [4]

  • Update icon assets [5]

  • Update strings [6]

  • 7.34.0-beta.3 [7]
